Detailed Description

Definition at line 23 of file aw_PolyGenerator.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

PolyGenerator::PolyGenerator ( SystemPtr  o  ) 

Base class of PolyGenerators, objects that return a pointer to an array. PolyGenerators are used for Generators that return multiple values.
